page.title: 04GOLDEN CAP
page.content: Golden Cap cont, It gets its name because at the top there is a Golden sand which shines in the sun. Below this the middle lias consist of a succession of clays, sands and Limestones. These have fallen to the beach below and contain a wide range of middle low lias, fossils. Many walks start from chideock around Langdon hill to Golden Cap. Many tourists walk to Golden Cap. Golden Cap is one of the fine headlands, partly hill and partly cliff which dominate the views, it can be approached from Seatown or Charmouth.
